title: Teremana Tequila: A Record Breaking First Year
itunes:title: Teremana Tequila: A Record Breaking First Year
description:
Jenna Fagnan, Co-Founder of Teremana Tequila, discusses the spirits industry, and how consumers latched-on to the brand during the pandemic. Osprey Funds CEO, Greg King, discusses the cryptocurrency market. Ira Jersey, Chief U.S. Rate Strategist for Bloomberg Intelligence, talks treasury refunding. Edward Price, former British trade official and current political economy adjunct at NYU, discusses the Fed and inflation concerns. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
